About

Take a look into my realm and witness the passion of my coding and design projects come to life, or rather, to pixels. My name is Tristan, a 19-year-old programming student at Artevelde University of Applied Sciences in Ghent.

Within my portfolio, you’ll discover a diverse array of projects, including websites created for school assignments and businesses, as well as photography and more.

Through these projects, I aim to showcase my skills and ultimately secure a job as a full-stack developer. This would enable me to engage in both aspects of development that I enjoy, front-end and back-end.

Now, let’s delve into it.
